description:
A carpenter and his talking pigeon help recover the Straw Hats` missing money, but the Franky Family won`t give up so easily. Luffy and Nami receive very bad news about their beloved boat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Galley-La Company ! L’impressionnant quai numéro un
